function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High density housing promoting contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Increase in the spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity and shared spaces","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, promoting vaccination, and enhancing ventilation systems","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, UV-C disinfection, and air purification devices","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in high-density areas","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Social disruption and lack of interaction due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, social well-being, and community cohesion","Mitigation":"Designing and promoting public spaces for safe social interaction, implementing outdoor activities, and fostering community engagement","Technologies":"Smart public space design, outdoor seating arrangements, and interactive urban installations","People":"General public, residents, and community members","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission risks in close-distance social interactions","Impact":"Increased risk of droplet transmission and close-contact exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promoting social distancing protocols, limiting close-proximity gatherings, and enforcing mask-wearing in crowded areas","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, social distancing apps, and public health communication tools","People":"Individuals in social settings and public spaces","Owner":"Public health agencies, local authorities, and event organizers"}]}
